page.title: 15CHARITIES
page.content:
{ GARBOLDISHAM}- Land and bequests between 1490 and 1879 were registered under the Charities Trusts Act 1853 for the Parish Poor relief, Parish Church maintenance and career help for needy children. The 1982 revision widened terms of reference, keeping to original objectives but with a more liberal interpretation. Annual disposable{FUNDS}are approx. Â£2000.
{BLO'NORTON -Dyers}Charity, shared with Kenninghall to benefit parish school children. Approximately Â£56 annually. {CHURCH LANDS}charity, 'Town field' of 8 acrea, The 'Lows' of 10 acrea. Approximately Â£1300 available annually for upkeep of the church. {FUEL ALLOTMENT}charity, Large Fen of 15 acres, Little Fen of 10 acres Approximately Â£300 available annually for fuel for the poor.
